description: This file defines the AppDatabase class which extends RoomDatabase for managing local database access in an Android app. It uses Room annotations and provides a singleton instance for database operations, mainly through the noteDao() method.

classes.name: AppDatabase
classes.description: An abstract class extending RoomDatabase, providing access to the NoteDao and managing singleton instance.

methods.name: getInstance
methods.description: Returns the singleton instance of AppDatabase, creating it if necessary, using Room.databaseBuilder with context, entity, and migration fallback.

methods.name: noteDao
methods.description: Abstract method to access the Note Data Access Object for CRUD operations on notes.
